name: HarryPotterSpells
0:
”Alexa, open Harry Potter Spells”
”What does Wingardium Leviosa do?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter spells
des:
Harry Potter Spells is a wonderful Alexa Skill. It gives you info about various Hogwarts magic spells, charms, enchantments, etc.
All you have to do is just invoke the skill by saying "Start Harry Potter Spells", then say any spell name!!
Thanks!!
Feel free to give any feedback at abhi.jjainn@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
